page.title: 07LAW & ORDER LOCAL HISTORY
page.content:
THERE IS NO POLICE STATION IN THE AREA BUT POLICE FROM THE NEIGHBOURING VILLAGE MAINTAIN LAW AND ORDER WHEN NECESSARY, THE CRIME RATE BEING VERY LOW.
{LOCAL HISTORY THE AREA UNDER SURVEY IS WITHIN THE PARISH OF KIRKMAIDEN, SO NAMED AFTER THE THREE MAIDENS WHO SUPPOSEDLY FOUNDED THE FIRST CHURCH. THERE IS ALSOPROOF THE ROMSNS WERE IN THE AREA DUE TO REMAINS OF ROUNDHOUSES FOUND MARYPORT,WHICH IS NOW A BEACH CARAVAN PARK, HAS A SHRINE DEDICATED TO MARY WHERE, MANY CENTURIES AGO, PEOPLE WORSHIPPED.
